title: This portable wireless charger can power up three devices at once. And it’s only $39.99.
content:
Macworld

Between holiday travel, office parties, family get-togethers, and other special seasonal events, there’s a good bet that all of your devices are going to be logging loads of extra hours of use over the next few weeks. So it shouldn’t be much of a surprise when the batteries in your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods are all circling the drain at the same time.

Thankfully, this multi-device wireless charger can bring all your critical devices back to full strength all at once.

Packing a beefy 5,000mAh capacity power bank, this portable, lightweight, transport-friendly charger features universal compatibility to start feeding all your Qi-enabled devices power seamlessly. And while it’s designed to charge devices wirelessly, it also features a USB-C port so even all your old-school plugin devices can drink in the power surge too.

This charger also includes a built-in intelligent chip that monitors power flow. That ensures every device gets an energy feed set to that device’s pace, protecting against overcharging, over-discharging, excessive currents, short circuits, or overheating.

At barely larger than the size of a credit card, this charger can slip into your pocket or your bag for immediate on-the-go power whenever you need it.

Whether you choose basic black or a cool steely blue, you can have ready power at more than half off its regular price. With the current deal, you can pick up this multi-device wireless charger for 66 percent off, just $39.99 while this limited-time offer lasts.
